statements: UPDATE WeatherData SET temperature = 30.5, humidity = 60.2 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE WeatherData SET temperature = 25.5, precipitation = 0.2 WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature < 30.0
UPDATE WeatherData SET humidity = 65.0, wind_speed = 10.5 WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND humidity > 60.0
